exact_source: CZR Resources Ltd (ASX: CZR) (CZR) advises that on 20 March 2025 it received an unsolicited, confidential, non-binding and conditional proposal from the participants in the Robe River Iron Associates Joint Venture (between various subsidiaries of Rio Tinto Limited (53%), Mitsui & Co Ltd (33%) and Nippon Steel Corporation (14%) (Robe River JV)).
